title: A sermon of S. Cyprian made on the Lordes prayer that is to wytte, the Paternoster.
author: Cyprian, Saint, Bishop of Carthage.
publisher: In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti typis impress.],
notes: A translation of: De Dominica oratione.
The translator's name, Thomas Paynell, appears on A1v.
Printer's name and place of publication from colophon.
Running title reads: A sermon of S. Cyp. on the Pater nost.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
